title: Turner Chiropractic & Rehab Center | Glendale Heights, IL
description: Chiropractic care aimed at empowering individuals to make positive decisions about their health by offering them knowledge and integrative treatment options in a friendly, caring environment.
cleaned_text: EMPOWERED HEALTHCARE TURNER CHIROPRACTIC & REHAB CENTER, P.C. OUR CLINIC Dr. John Turner is the founding director of Turner Chiropractic & Rehab Center. The clinic was established in 1986 and has been treating patients using holistic means for over 30 years. Dr. Turner is a Board Certified Chiropractic Neurologist, practicing as a primary care physician in the Chicagoland area. The clinic offers alternative and functional means of medicine including chiropractic neurology, acupuncture, nutrition, allergy relief, applied kinesiology and homeopathy, in addition to traditional chiropractic care. Dr. Turner has had the privilege of being on the adjunct faculty of the National University of Health Sciences as a preceptor, helping train future Doctors of Chiropractic in a clinical setting. He is also a well known lecturer, having been a featured speaker at the National Athletic Trainers Association, the Autism One, and the Weston A. Price Foundation annual conferences. Dr. Turner has co-authored a book, [Performance Without Pain](https://www.amazon.com/Performance-without-Pain-Step-Step/dp/0967089778), which focuses on nutrition as the foundation for health and vitality. Dr. Turner is proud to work alongside his son-in-law, Dr. John Schori within his clinic Renewed Balance Health & Wellness. Dr. Schori earned his Doctorate in Chiropractic, in addition to his Certification in Chinese Acupuncture, from National University of Health Sciences in 2011. He also earned dual degrees in Nutrition and Psychology while doing his undergraduate studies at the prestigious Case Western Reserve University. Dr. Turner and Dr. Schori are available for speaking engagements to the public on various health topics. We invite you to call our office or visit [renewedbalance.health](https://renewedbalance.health) for additional information. SERVICES WE OFFER: As primary care physicians, we offer a wide range of professional services to help keep families strong and healthy. Early detection of imbalances in our patients' structural and physiological health has been the key to our success. To do this, we use innovative techniques and equipment. Chiropractic manipulation Physiotherapy, including ultrasound and electrical stim Cold laser Nutritional and dietary counseling Needle and electrical acupuncture Allergy reduction techniques Applied kinesiology and muscle testing Functional rehab Meridian Stress Assessments (EAV) Laboratory testing & interpretation Nutritional supplements and homeopathic remedies Tele-medicine options are offered in addition to in-office patient visits. REGARDING CONDITIONS WE TREAT: We see patients for a wide variety of conditions. Each patient is treated using a whole-person approach. Our goal is to find the root cause of the condition and not to just treat the patient's symptoms. Some, but not all of the conditions we treat are: Chronic and injury related back and neck pain Neurological conditions and headaches Joint and muscle injuries of the arms and legs Fibromyalgia and fatigue Food and environmental allergies and sensitivities Digestive issues and gastrointestinal discomfort Hormone imbalances and infertility Stress, nutrition and lifestyle related conditions Difficult to diagnose cases, etc. We also have a network of medical doctors and other practitioners we work closely with to whom we feel comfortable referring, if necessary.
